info.author: Syslab.com GmbH
info.description:
.. contents::

Introduction
============

Requirements
============

* docsplit and dependencies (http://documentcloud.github.com/docsplit/)
* install collective.documentvier in your Plone Site


Contributors
============

Syslab.com GmbH, Author

Changelog
=========

1.3 (2015-07-31)
----------------

- Don't install collective.documentviewer. We use the code but we
  don't want it installed because it overrides views for PDF files.
  [deroiste]


1.2 (2015-05-15)
----------------

- Nothing changed yet.


1.1 (2015-05-15)
----------------

- Nothing changed yet.


1.0a2 (2014-07-11)
------------------

- improved buildout [reinhardt]
- added some logging [reinhardt]
- added view to upload documents for conversion, refs #10398 [reinhardt]
- limit number of images to 20 by default, refs #10398 [reinhardt]
- new version of documentviewer [reinhardt]


1.0a1 (2012-08-31)
------------------

- initial release
  [reinhardt]
info.name: slc.docconv
info.summary: Add-on for collective.documentviewer that allows web service like conversion

Introduction

Requirements

  • docsplit and dependencies (http://documentcloud.github.com/docsplit/)
  • install collective.documentvier in your Plone Site

Contributors

Syslab.com GmbH, Author

Changelog

1.3 (2015-07-31)

  • Don’t install collective.documentviewer. We use the code but we don’t want it installed because it overrides views for PDF files. [deroiste]

1.2 (2015-05-15)

  • Nothing changed yet.

1.1 (2015-05-15)

  • Nothing changed yet.

1.0a2 (2014-07-11)

  • improved buildout [reinhardt]
  • added some logging [reinhardt]
  • added view to upload documents for conversion, refs #10398 [reinhardt]
  • limit number of images to 20 by default, refs #10398 [reinhardt]
  • new version of documentviewer [reinhardt]

1.0a1 (2012-08-31)
